thread.title: ‘Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse’ whets appetite for more
thread.title_full: ‘Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse’ whets appetite for more - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Michael Ordoña
title: ‘Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse’ whets appetite for more
text:
Photo: Paramount Pictures Tye Sheridan in "Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse." Tye Sheridan in "Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse."
In “Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse,” three boys keep themselves physically strong, mentally awake and morally straight while faced with a super-hot traveling companion and a whole town of undead neighbors trying to eat them. The movie didn’t screen in time for press, but its many trailers give the impression of a Frankenstein’s monster cobbled together from multiple sources. For instance: Tye Sheridan in "Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse." Tye Sheridan in "Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse."
